review_title: Good product, probably could find something more affordable locally
reviews: Overall the scarf is warm and comfortable, but I think I can find something similar at dollar store for a fraction of the price.

review_title: Looks good, nice and warm and very cozy around the ...
reviews: Replaced one I lost. It is exactly what I was hoping for. Looks good, nice and warm and very cozy around the neck in these Canadian winters.

reviews: Excellent scarf. I bought these to have a scarf wide enough to wrap around my face for colder weather and boy, my nose and ears are thanking me for it.
